Name: New Oberon Confederation
Description: The New Oberon Confederation emerged in 3086 following the withdrawal of Clan Hell's Horses from the Periphery. Centered on Oberon VI, the Confederation reestablished its independence under local administrators who took control after the Clan's departure. With assistance from Clan Ghost Bear technicians, they refurbished Grimfort — a fortress originally built by Hendrik Grimm — transforming it into a modern Castle Brian to bolster their defenses.
ReputationStatements: Commander, your constant skirmishes against the New Oberon Confederation are exhausting for both of us. Let us set aside hostilities and explore mutual opportunities for gain.
Commander, the Confederation can match any offer from our rivals. Consider this contract and let us forge a beneficial partnership.
Your victories over us prove your capabilities, Commander. The New Oberon Confederation acknowledges your skill.  Take this contract, and let us work together rather than as adversaries.
The restored government of the New Oberon Confederation seeks a mercenary outfit of your caliber for an important contract. Are you interested?
Your combat prowess continues to impress, Commander. Our mutual gains have been fruitful, and I have another contract for you that should enrich us both.
Welcome back, Commander. The Confederation values our past collaborations and has another lucrative job lined up for you, one with significant spoils to claim.
Ahoy, Commander! Good to see you again. I've got a plum job that promises a hefty payday and plenty of spoils. Shall we set sail together once more?
MissionSuccessStatements: Excellent work, Commander! You handled the contract brilliantly, and your payment, let's call it 'loot', is already in your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: That's not the level of determination the New Oberon Confederation expects, Commander. Partial payment is yours for what you achieved, but next time, complete the mission or face the consequences.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Failure like this dishonors the agreement, Commander. Be thankful I'm sparing you further reprimand. Leave, and don't return unless you can uphold your word.
